snippet: The major stock indexes jumped after a Federal Reserve decision to help the economy by buying long-term mortgage securities.
abstract: Major stock indexes jump after a Federal Reserve decision to help the economy by buying long-term mortgage securities.
lead_paragraph: The major stock indexes jumped after a Federal Reserve decision to help the economy by buying long-term mortgage securities.

headline.main: Fed Action Spurs Broad Rally; S.&P. Rises 1.6%
headline.print_headline: Fed Action Spurs Broad Rally; S.&P. Rises 1.6%
